backend/main.mo: Defines salon, booking, user, and image types with storage maps, authorization mixins, and a seeding function for default Swiss salons.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required frontend AppV1.jsx replacement and associated validation tasks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files covering pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Thin wrapper that renders and exports AppV1 as the application root.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large self‑contained UI implementing the V7000 Nexus Infinity landing, client explorer, pro app stub, mock data, and localStorage state manager.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder for an authentication header component.
Empty placeholder for a salon creation form component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty placeholder for a loyalty member card component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty placeholder for a monopoly mode toggle component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty placeholder for a motion‑enhanced button component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty placeholder for a reusable premium badge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder for a tactile pressable wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder for a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty placeholder for a multi‑step pro salon creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder for a pro studio creation UI component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder for a revenue chart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder for a salon list rendering component.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder for a VIP dashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and auto‑invalidates dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state using AuthClient, including identity loading, login, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, custom utilities, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping App in React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style description strings for salons based on category, type, tags, and city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes overall project state, including version history, architectural notes, resets, and known issues.
